elements.label: A Wounded Face
elements.description: I should have this looked at immediately. [A total of five Wounds and Debilitations will kill you.]

elements.label: A Pierced Hand
elements.description: I should have this looked at immediately. [A total of five Wounds and Debilitations will kill you.]

elements.label: A Shattered Knee
elements.description: I should have this looked at immediately. [A total of five Wounds and Debilitations will kill you.]

elements.label: A Ripped Ear
elements.description: I should have this looked at immediately. [A total of five Wounds and Debilitations will kill you.]

elements.label: The Madrugad's Shadow
elements.description: Here is that unerring cold that waits in the hours that precede the sun; here the Madrugad makes her tally.

elements.label: The Velvet's Shadow
elements.description: The coiling of the roots, the safety of the shadows, the rumbling in the mists - these mark the presence of the Velvet.

elements.label: The Beachcomber's Shadow
elements.description: Shrapnel gleams like silver, and bone beckons like finest porcelain. That greedy, seeking Hour called Beachcomber has come to roost.

elements.label: The Colonel's Shadow
elements.description: Sights and sounds grow duller, and colours leak from the world. The cold on my neck feels like the press of a knife. The Colonel watches from on high.

elements.label: The Lionsmith's Shadow
elements.description: A boastful heat rises in the cold; fires hiss and laugh. Thoughts that do not stoke anger become difficult to hold onto. The Lionsmith is here in attendance.

elements.label: The Wolf-Divided's Shadow
elements.description: That scent which is neither tar nor blood nor ozone. The Wolf-Divided's rage boils beneath the air.

elements.label: Wolves
elements.description:
'Whoever feeds the wolf in the winter will be eaten by him in the spring.'

- Greek Proverb

elements.label: A Dove
elements.description: A bird of peace - perhaps it is lost.

elements.label: Cats
elements.description: Amiable little killers.

elements.label: Ruins
elements.description: Crumbling edifices and old masonry provide what protection they can.

elements.label: Sewers
elements.description: Where the shadows survive, so can we.

elements.label: Heights
elements.description: To strike from up on high.

elements.label: Flames
elements.description: Fire is the winter that warms and the spring that consumes.

elements.label: Snows
elements.description: We have learnt winter's measure, and will be at home in it.

elements.label: Storms
elements.description: The rain on our backs is a rejuvenation. Baptism.

elements.label: Fog
elements.description: Mists are a gift from the Velvet, so long as one can figure how to appreciate them.

elements.label: Dawn
elements.description: Sunrise, when the world is clean.

elements.label: Noon
elements.description: From here, the sun can only decline.

elements.label: Sunset
elements.description: Sunset, when the light is richer.

elements.label: Night
elements.description: Under darkness.

elements.label: Opportunity: A Church
elements.description: A place of faith, but not of power. I could quarter some of my men here if I needed to, or perhaps the quiet space might lead me to a useful realization.

elements.label: Opportunity: A Farm
elements.description: We could convince the farmers to furnish us with food and drink - men with guns are famously convincing, after all - or perhaps we would rather use their land for lodgings.
